original: Anell, Gustaf-Adolf (Gösta) Mau-ritz, järnhandlare, Ulricehamn, f. 6/11/ 96 i Ulricehamn av rådm. Mauritz A. o. Bertha Gunnarson. G. 24 m. Elsa Lönner. Barn: Karl-Erik f. 25, Birgit 26, Gunnar 40. — Realex. i Skövde 13, Gbgs handrinst. 13-15. Anst. i Mauritz Anells Järnhandel A-B 15-37, ensam inneh. av firman »sed. 38. Led. av sitadsfuHni. sed. 35, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Ulricehamns, Sanat. & Badanst. sed. 40, ordf. i Västergötl. järnihandl :fören. sed. 40, led. av lokalstyr. f. A-B Sv. Hand :banken i Ulricehamn sed. 45, led. av styr. f. Ulricehamns Tidn. o Ulricehamns köpm:fören.
translated: Anell, Gustaf-Adolf (Gösta) Mauritz, ironmonger, Ulricehamn, born November 6, 1896 in Ulricehamn to councillor Mauritz A. and Bertha Gunnarson. Married to Elsa Lönner for 24 years. Children: Karl-Erik born in 1925, Birgit born in 1926, Gunnar born in 1940. Completed Realskolan in Skövde in 1913 and studied at Göteborgs handelsinstitut from 1913-1915. Employed at Mauritz Anells Järnhandel A-B from 1915-1937 and became the sole proprietor of the company in 1938. He is a member of the city council since 1935, chairman of the board of directors for A-B Ulricehamns Sanatorium & Bathhouse since 1940, chairman of the board of directors for Västergötländska Järnhandelsföreningen since 1940, member of the local board for Svenska Handelsbanken in Ulricehamn since 1945, and a member of the board of directors for Ulricehamns Tidning and Ulricehamns Buy and Sell Association.
